body:
I'm trying to build LLVM on CentOS 7 with GCC 7.1.0. I'm seeing the following error message:
```
In file included from /blues/gpfs/home/ajstewart/spack/var/spack/stage/llvm-4.0.0-iwr5xsmpa2scpclnuhevp4od7pa3j7mq/llvm-4.0.0.src/tools/lldb/source/Utility/TaskPool.cpp:10:0:
/blues/gpfs/home/ajstewart/spack/var/spack/stage/llvm-4.0.0-iwr5xsmpa2scpclnuhevp4od7pa3j7mq/llvm-4.0.0.src/tools/lldb/include/lldb/Utility/TaskPool.h: In static member function ‘static std::future<typename std::result_of<_Functor(_ArgTypes ...)>::type> TaskPool::AddTask(F&&, Args&& ...)’:
/blues/gpfs/home/ajstewart/spack/var/spack/stage/llvm-4.0.0-iwr5xsmpa2scpclnuhevp4od7pa3j7mq/llvm-4.0.0.src/tools/lldb/include/lldb/Utility/TaskPool.h:122:12: error: ‘bind’ is not a member of ‘std’
       std::bind(std::forward<F>(f), std::forward<Args>(args)...));
            ^~~~
/blues/gpfs/home/ajstewart/spack/var/spack/stage/llvm-4.0.0-iwr5xsmpa2scpclnuhevp4od7pa3j7mq/llvm-4.0.0.src/tools/lldb/include/lldb/Utility/TaskPool.h:122:12: note: suggested alternative: ‘end’
       std::bind(std::forward<F>(f), std::forward<Args>(args)...));
            ^~~~
            end
```
Full build log [here](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/1203298/spack-build.txt).
title: Unable to build LLVM on CentOS 7
